name: Indian and International Systems of Numeration

questions.question:
Write the following number in words as per Indian numeration:
325047
answers: THREE LAKH TWENTY FIVE THOUSAND AND FORTY SEVEN

questions.question:
Write the following number in words as per Indian numeration:
447896
answers: FOUR LAKH FORTY SEVEN THOUSAND EIGHT HUNDRED AND NINETY SIX

questions.question:
Write the following number in words as per Indian numeration:
752368
answers: SEVEN LAKH FIFTY TWO THOUSAND THREE HUNDRED AND SIXTY EIGHT

questions.question:
Write the following number in words as per Indian numeration:
1478965
answers: FOURTEEN LAKH SEVENTY EIGHT THOUSAND NINE HUNDRED AND SIXTY FIVE

questions.question:
Write the following number in words as per International numeration:
652104
answers: SIX HUNDRED FIFTY TWO THOUSAND ONE HUNDRED AND FOUR

questions.question:
Write the following number in words as per International numeration:
412589
answers: FOUR HUNDRED TWELVE THOUSAND FIVE HUNDRED AND EIGHTY NINE

questions.question:
Write the following number in words as per International numeration:
602583
answers: SIX HUNDRED TWO THOUSAND FIVE HUNDRED AND EIGHTY THREE

questions.question:
Write the following number in words as per International numeration:
963258
answers: NINE HUNDRED SIXTY THREE THOUSAND TWO HUNDRED AND FIFTY EIGHT

questions.question:
Write the following number separating the periods with commas as per International numeration:
TWO HUNDRED FOUR THOUSAND SIX HUNDRED AND ONE

Write the following number separating the periods with commas as per International numeration:
ONE MILLION TWO HUNDRED FOUR THOUSAND ONE HUNDRED AND ONE

Write the following number separating the periods with commas as per International numeration:
SEVEN MILLION FOUR HUNDRED AND SEVEN
